comment._content:
Nana Otumfuo Agyeman Prempeh II. donning a traditional african wear known as the "Kente" and sporting next to no bling bling at all!! However owned the "Ashanti Empire" was educated in London metroplitan university, which was formerly a polytechnic (by the name of university of North London).

a common denominator, migration from the eastern hemisphre to the western Hemisphere
to aquire knowledge!! As an infamous Redskin indian said "White man books enlightning good when seeking knowledege!!" Lol!!
